title: NYT: Biden Allows Ukraine to Strike Russia With Long-Range U.S. Missiles. With two months left in office, the president for t...
content: NYT: Biden Allows Ukraine to Strike Russia With Long-Range U.S. Missiles. With two months left in office, the president for the first time authorized the Ukrainian military to use the system known as ATACMS to help defend its forces in the Kursk region of Russia
author: Live UA Map
